DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Combination Ginkgo Extract Ginseng Extract ( YY-162 ) Children With ADHD
DOC.detailed_description: This Double-Blind , two arm , multi-center , Interventional , 8 week study start YY-162 ( Combination Ginkgo extract Ginseng extract child ADHD . Assessment efficacy safety perform baseline , week 2,4 , 8 . At first visit , full psychiatric history , demographic date physical examination undertaken . Throughout study , follow procedure , documentation evaluation perform ; K-ARS , IOWA Conner 's rating scale , CGI-S/I , ATA , Children 's color trail test stroop test , Intelligence test ( KEDI-WISC ) adverse event reporting .
